message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but I'm hoping to get it for a bit less.  Would you be willing to go down to $125?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $135?
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice.  I'm still hoping to get it for a bit closer to my target. Would you be willing to go down to $130?
Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go any lower than $135. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings. How about we meet in the middle at $132.50?
